divs: sighting detailsi first noticed the object when i exited a warehouse on dorsey road in hanover, maryland. at first i hought it was an airplane, but it was brighter than any airplane i have ever seen and i live near bwi airport. it was bright like a christmas light. it moved slowly across the sky from left to right and back again in a straight line and sometimes stopping to hover in place. at first it was flashing red\white then it changed to flashing red\green between it would stay solid red. it continued this pattern the whole time i observed it. i don't know how long it was there before i noticed it and it was still there about a half hour later when i left the area.
Summary: Slow moving and color changing light in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elkridge
There were no other sightings in Elkridge on or around December 30th 2008
